scripts.frontend: npm run _frontend:prepare && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.frontend:prod: npm run _frontend:prepare && cd frontend && npm run build && npx serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 2 && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd .. && echo '✅ 所有依赖安装完成'
scripts.clean: npm run stop && rm -rf ~/.demochaid chain/build frontend/node_modules frontend/build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.test: cd chain && /opt/homebrew/bin/go test ./... && cd ../frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false
scripts._chain:build: (cd chain && mkdir -p build && /opt/homebrew/bin/go build -o build/demochaid ./cmd/demochaid) || (echo '❌ 区块链构建失败，可能是网络问题。请稍后重试或使用 npm run dev-frontend-only 只启动前端' && exit 1)
scripts._chain:init: cd chain && ./build/demochaid init mynode --chain-id demo-chain && ./build/demochaid keys add validator --keyring-backend test && ./build/demochaid keys add user1 --keyring-backend test && ./build/demochaid add-genesis-account validator 1000000000stake --keyring-backend test && ./build/demochaid add-genesis-account user1 1000000000stake --keyring-backend test && ./build/demochaid gentx validator 100000000stake --chain-id demo-chain --keyring-backend test && ./build/demochaid collect-gentxs
scripts._chain:prepare: test -f chain/build/demochaid || npm run _chain:build && test -d ~/.demochaid || npm run _chain:init
scripts._health:chain: curl -f http://localhost:26657/status >/dev/null && echo '✅ 区块链节点正常' || echo '❌ 区块链节点未运行'
scripts._health:frontend: curl -f http://localhost:3000 >/dev/null && echo '✅ 前端应用正常' || echo '❌ 前端应用未运行'
scripts.help: echo '常用命令:' && echo '  npm run dev              - 启动完整开发环境' && echo '  npm run dev-frontend-only - 只启动前端应用' && echo '  npm run install-all     - 安装所有项目依赖' && echo '  npm run stop            - 停止所有服务' && echo '  npm run health          - 检查所有服务状态' && echo '  npm run health-frontend - 只检查前端状态' && echo '  npm run setup           - 首次完整设置' && echo '  npm run setup-frontend-only - 只设置前端' && echo '  npm run clean           - 清理所有数据' && echo '  npm run logs            - 查看区块链日志'
